HEALTH.AI_DISCLAIMER_TEXT: These exercises are generated by artificial intelligence for informational purposes only. They do not constitute medical advice. Consult a healthcare professional before starting any exercise program, especially if you have pre-existing medical conditions.
HEALTH.CHATBOT_CONTEXT_DESC: This chatbot has access to your results and can answer questions about your health profile.

cardio-1.TEXT: Have you ever been diagnosed with heart disease?

cardio-2.TEXT: Do you feel chest pain at rest or during effort?

cardio-3.TEXT: Do you have high blood pressure (hypertension)?

cardio-4.TEXT: Do you sometimes lose your balance because of dizziness?

cardio-5.TEXT: Do you get short of breath quickly during light effort (climbing stairs)?

musculo-1.TEXT: Do you have bone or joint problems that could be worsened by exercise?

musculo-4.TEXT: Can you stand on one leg for 30 seconds?

metabolic-2.TEXT: What is your approximate Body Mass Index (BMI)?

lifestyle-2.TEXT: How many hours do you sleep on average per night?

lifestyle-4.TEXT: How would you rate your diet?

OPTIONS.excellent: Excellent (balanced, rich in fruits and vegetables)
OPTIONS.poor: Poor (lots of fast food, few vegetables)

activity-1.TEXT: How many days per week do you do at least 30 minutes of moderate physical activity?

activity-2.TEXT: Can you walk 2 km without stopping?

activity-3.TEXT: How long has it been since you last exercised regularly?

activity-4.TEXT: On average, how much time do you spend sitting per day?

mental-1.TEXT: How would you rate your overall stress level?

mental-2.TEXT: Over the past 2 weeks, have you felt depressed or hopeless?

mental-3.TEXT: Do you generally have enough energy for your daily activities?

info-medications.TEXT: Are you currently taking medications prescribed by a doctor?

RISK_DESCRIPTIONS.cardio-5: Shortness of breath during light effort

at-risk.1: Consult a doctor before starting any exercise program
at-risk.2: Start very gradually with gentle exercises

needs-improvement.1: Start with light exercises and increase gradually
needs-improvement.2: Consult a healthcare professional for personalized advice

moderate.1: You can practice moderate physical activity
moderate.2: Pay attention to your body's signals

good.2: You can progress to more intense exercises

excellent.2: Challenge yourself with more ambitious goals

CATEGORY.cardiovascular: Improve your cardiovascular health with gentle endurance activities (walking, cycling)
CATEGORY.musculoskeletal: Strengthen muscles and joints with adapted mobility and strengthening exercises
CATEGORY.respiratory: Practice breathing exercises to improve lung capacity
CATEGORY.metabolic: Combine physical activity and a balanced diet to improve your metabolism
CATEGORY.lifestyle: Adopt healthier habits: sleep, nutrition, stress management
CATEGORY.physical-activity: Gradually increase your daily physical activity
CATEGORY.mental-health: Add relaxation and breathing exercises for your mental well-being

RECOMMENDATIONS.HIGH_RISK_WARNING: Warning: important risk factors have been identified. Medical consultation is recommended.

HOW_IT_WORKS.TITLE: How FytAI Works
HOW_IT_WORKS.SUBTITLE: Discover our transparent methodology and health assessment process
HOW_IT_WORKS.DISCLAIMER_TEXT: FytAI is a decision support tool and does not replace the advice of a doctor, physiotherapist or other healthcare professional. Always consult a professional before starting a new exercise program.
HOW_IT_WORKS.STEP1_DESC: We analyze essential parameters of your health profile, grouped into 6 categories:
HOW_IT_WORKS.STEP2_DESC: Your answers are analyzed to calculate a comprehensive health score.
HOW_IT_WORKS.SCORE_ALGORITHM: Calculation algorithm based on recognized health indicators
HOW_IT_WORKS.STEP3_DESC: Based on your profile, we recommend adapted exercises:
HOW_IT_WORKS.STEP4_DESC: You receive a complete assessment with personalized recommendations.
HOW_IT_WORKS.CAPABILITY_2: Suggest exercises adapted to your level
HOW_IT_WORKS.LIMITATION_4: Take into account all particular situations
HOW_IT_WORKS.METHOD_1_DESC: We use established health indicators and standard physical activity recommendations.
HOW_IT_WORKS.METHOD_2_DESC: Each recommendation is calculated based on your specific answers and health profile.
HOW_IT_WORKS.METHOD_3_DESC: We are transparent: our system is a wellness tool, not a medical device.
HOW_IT_WORKS.OMS_DESC: Our scoring system is based on World Health Organization (WHO) guidelines regarding physical activity, nutrition, and mental health.
HOW_IT_WORKS.OMS_REC_1_DESC: WHO recommends 150 to 300 minutes of moderate-intensity activity per week, or 75 to 150 minutes of vigorous-intensity activity.
HOW_IT_WORKS.OMS_REC_2_DESC: Muscle-strengthening activities involving major muscle groups are recommended at least 2 days per week.
HOW_IT_WORKS.OMS_REC_3_DESC: Limiting sedentary time and replacing sedentary behavior with physical activity of any intensity provides health benefits.
HOW_IT_WORKS.CTA_TITLE: Ready to check your health profile?
HOW_IT_WORKS.CTA_DESC: Now that you understand our approach, get started!

FAQ.TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.SUBTITLE: All answers to your questions about FytAI
FAQ.Q1_QUESTION: Is the assessment really free? Will you spam me?
FAQ.Q1_ANSWER: Yes, FytAI is 100% free. We don't ask for your email and will never spam you. No registration is required to use the service.
FAQ.Q2_QUESTION: How is the health score calculated?
FAQ.Q2_ANSWER: The health score is calculated locally based on your answers to questions across 6 categories: cardiovascular, musculoskeletal, metabolic, lifestyle, physical activity, and mental health. Only exercises are AI-generated.
FAQ.Q3_QUESTION: Who created FytAI? Are there doctors involved?
FAQ.Q3_ANSWER: FytAI was created by a team of developers passionate about health and technology. We don't have doctors on the team, which is why we emphasize that our recommendations don't replace professional medical advice.
FAQ.Q4_ANSWER: Your data is processed in real-time to generate your assessment and is not stored permanently on our servers. We don't sell or share your personal information with third parties.
FAQ.Q5_QUESTION: Can I trust recommendations if I have a serious medical condition?
FAQ.Q5_ANSWER: No. If you have a serious medical condition (heart disease, recent surgery, severe conditions, etc.), you MUST consult a doctor before starting any physical activity. FytAI can give you ideas, but only a medical professional can validate their safety.
FAQ.Q6_QUESTION: Can I redo the questionnaire if I'm not satisfied?
FAQ.Q6_ANSWER: Absolutely! You can redo the questionnaire as many times as you want. Your health status might evolve, and you might get different recommendations.
FAQ.Q7_QUESTION: Are my data sold to third parties?
FAQ.Q7_ANSWER: No, never. Your data is processed only to generate your assessment and is not stored on our servers after analysis. We do not sell any data.
FAQ.Q8_QUESTION: How long is my data kept?
FAQ.Q8_ANSWER: Your questionnaire answers are saved locally in your browser. They are not sent to any external server. You can clear your saved results at any time.
FAQ.HONESTY_1: We do not claim to have scientific or medical validation. FytAI is a technological tool, not a medical device.
FAQ.HONESTY_2: Our recommendations are calculated based on standard health guidelines and may not suit everyone.
FAQ.HONESTY_3: Our goal is to help you reflect on your health and explore wellness options, not to give you definitive prescriptions.
FAQ.CONTACT_US: Feel free to explore our other pages or start your assessment.

ABOUT.TITLE: About FytAI
ABOUT.SUBTITLE: Discover who we are and why we created FytAI
ABOUT.STORY_P1: FytAI was born from a simple desire: to help people understand their health profile and take the first steps towards a healthier lifestyle.
ABOUT.STORY_P2: We wanted to create a tool that truly takes into account who you are: your current health status, your lifestyle, your constraints. Not a generic quiz, but a real personalized assessment.
ABOUT.STORY_P3: FytAI is not perfect and we know it. It's a constantly improving project, guided by user feedback and our passion for making health awareness accessible to everyone.
ABOUT.VALUE_PRIVACY_DESC: Your data is never sold. It is processed locally and not stored after analysis.
ABOUT.VALUE_ACCURACY_DESC: We don't claim to replace a doctor. Our recommendations are suggestions, not prescriptions.
ABOUT.VALUE_TRANSPARENCY_DESC: We tell you exactly how our system works and what it can and cannot do.
ABOUT.VALUE_FREE_DESC: FytAI is free, without ads, without spam, without mandatory registration.
ABOUT.TECH_INTRO: We believe you have the right to know exactly how our system works.
ABOUT.TECH_ANGULAR: Modern frontend framework for a smooth user experience
ABOUT.TECH_DOTNET: Robust and secure backend for data processing
ABOUT.TECH_AI: AI assistant to answer your questions
ABOUT.LIMITATION_1: We are not a medical service and cannot diagnose or treat health conditions
ABOUT.LIMITATION_2: We do not have doctors or physiotherapists on our development team
ABOUT.LIMITATION_3: Our system has not been validated by clinical studies
ABOUT.LIMITATION_4: We cannot guarantee that our recommendations will suit you 100%
ABOUT.CONTACT_DESC: Check out our FAQ or try FytAI for yourself!
ABOUT.TEAM_DESC: A team passionate about health and technology
